SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_date, o.total_price, o.delivery_status,
i.order_item_id, i.product_id, i.quantity, i.status AS item_status, i.color, i.size,
p.name AS product_name, p.cost AS price, p.main_image1 FROM orderlist o JOIN orderitem i ON o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, i.order_item_id ASC

p.name AS product_name, p.cost AS price, p.main_image1
